message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. I think this is a great price considering the value it brings to you.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10250. This is a fair compromise considering the value the product brings to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $9800 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product to you for $10500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value the product brings to you.
